review_title: Un Chrome book est vraiment différent d'un Microsoft.
review_body: La simplicité à démarrer pour la première fois m'a bien plu.L'utilisation est simple et je me suis tout de suite vu travailler plus facilement qu'avec le système Windows 11.

review_title: Fine but low RAM hurt this laptop a LOT
review_body: It is a fine laptop to do daily normal chores, but be very careful to not ask for too much.This is a very bad choice for business laptop because only 4gb of RAM is way not enough.Everything is a struggle to load because of this.Also, screen quality is very bad. There is never an angle that is not annoying for your eyes.You definitly get what you pay for.
This was a gift for my adult daughter.. after returning the original one without the operating system....the proper replacement is running very well!
I bought it for my Grandson, he needed for shcool.He really likes it and uses every day.
Lightweight, fast , perfect for the jobAmazing battery life

So I received this as a gift and I wasnsent the link so I could see the specs.1st off. The ad above states there is a SD card slot. There is NOT.It is pretty quick. It really sucks that you can't put apps on the desk top.We ended up having to buy a "hub" so that I can hook it up to an HDMI cord AND a SD card reader.It's really frustrating to know that the ad lied about part of the devices capabilities.
Large 15.6 inch screen, Intel CPU, 5 years of google updates.
using for 3 months , but now having issues with unable to power on. not really pleased with this chromebook 2nd time this has happened... should have stuck with asus !

L'article fonctionne très bien et sommes satisfait du produit.

review_title: So far so good but missing a feature listed/pictured in ad
review_body: Liked the price point of this Chromebook and it's features but the one delivered to me does not have the micro SD card reader it is, at least according to the Amazon ad, supposed to have. My decision to buy this particular Chromebook was based partially on this feature. When mine arrived without a reader I double checked the ad and it clearly states/pictures the Chromebook as having a SD card reader. I don't know if I'm going to try and return it as I really like it otherwise. Not sure about the longevity of the item but my first impressions are good. The screen is just OK but nothing special. The build quality seems fine for a plastic body Chromebook but I worry long term about the hinges as with previous laptops/netbooks this is a weak point The speakers are bottom firing and tends to muffle sound a bit. The keyboard feels a little cheap but I've used much worse and for the price I'm fine with it. If it included the promised card reader I would have no problem rating it higher but this omission really bothers me. and lets down an otherwise decent machine.
Awesome Chromebook, No Complaints!!Everything works Great, Volume is Excellent even better with headphones.

I love everything about this little Chromebook, except that despite the images and description, this thing shipped (in Canada) with this god-awful “bilingual keyboard”. Unlike Windows, you can’t map the weird key so you have a full sized Shift key, so every time you mean to capitalize a letter, instead you get “/“. Very upset with this bait and switch, Amazon.

We bought it as a birthday gift for a ninety-year elder who only use for surf website, append zoom meeting, sometimes edit word document. What I need to do is setup Wi-Fi and change input language, and download zoom meeting app. It is so easy to setup and use, the elder likes it and happy to have it. Hope it can last long enough for the elder to use.

Hey guys! I originally purchased a Lenovo laptop with 12 G of ram, and one terabite hardrive. This was a piece of POO that could not even surf the internet. I tried everything to no avail. A total piece of poo. I got so mad at it one day I punched it into oblivion. Now I'm satisfied. THIS COMPUTER however is super fast on the internet, start up, shut down and just about everything else. Do not buy this computer if you need a lot of storage space ON the computer. Do not buy this computer if you are going to work with complicated programs. However, if you want a great little computer with LONG BATTERY LIFE, then BUY THIS COMPUTER. You can't beat the combination of Acer and Intel.
This was an amazing laptop. It has everything that I need for schooling highly recommended
